## LiteralUnion type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export type LiteralUnion<T extends U, U> = T | (U & {})
```

## Example


```ts
type Foo = LiteralUnion<'dog' | 'cat', string>
const foo:Foo = '' // You will get auto-completion for `dog` and `cat` literals.
```
